sourcesContent:
<router-outlet>
<header>

  <app-header></app-header>

</header>
<footer>
  <app-footer></app-footer>


</footer>


</router-outlet>


<mat-tab-group>
  <mat-tab label="List of Movies">
    <app-list-of-movies [externalMovieInfo1]="moviesData2"></app-list-of-movies>


    <mat-tab label="Movie Screens">
      <!-- Pass MovieShowTimingsData to the MovieScreensComponent -->
      <app-movie-screens [movieShowTimingsData]="movieShowTimingsData"></app-movie-screens>
    </mat-tab>

    
    <mat-tab-group>
      <mat-tab label="List of Movies">
        <app-list-of-movies [externalMovieInfo1]="moviesData2"></app-list-of-movies>
      </mat-tab>
    
      <mat-tab label="Movie Screens">
        <!-- Pass MovieShowTimingsData to the MovieScreensComponent -->
        <app-movie-screens [movieShowTimingsData]="movieShowTimingsData"></app-movie-screens>
      </mat-tab>
    </mat-tab-group>
